description: Whiskey Sockets Baileys WhatsApp Bot by LORD_JOEL

SESSION_ID.description: Put your SESSION_ID here. Make sure it starts with JOEL-XMD~ or get session id from https://joel-xmd-bot.onrender.com/

MENU_IMAGE_URL.description: Add URL for mention reply and menu if you want.

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Put the owner number for bot.

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Set true if you want always online.

AUTO_VOICE.description: Set true if you want automatic voice reply.

AUTO_REPLY.description: Set true if you want automatic reply.

AUTO_STICKER.description: Set true if you want automatic sticker.

AUTO_STATUS_REACT.description: Set true for automatic status react & seen.

AUTO_STATUS_REPLY.description: Set true for auto reply message on status seen.

AUTO_STATUS_MSG.description: Type custom message on status reply

ANTI_LINK.description: Set true if you want bot to auto remove group links.

ANTI_BAD.description: Set true if you want bot to auto delete bad words.

DESCRIPTION.description: Add caption for menu and others.

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Set true if you want auto recording.

AUTO_TYPING.description: Set true if you want auto typing.

AUTO_REACT.description: Set true if you want bot to react on every message.

ADMIN_EVENTS.description: Set true if you want to know who promoted/demoted a member.

WELCOME.description: Set true if you want welcome/goodbye messages in groups.

ANTI_CALL.description: Set true if you want bot to auto reject calls.

ANTI_DEL_PATH.description: Use 'same' to resend deleted message in same chat, otherwise 'inbox'.

ANTI_DELETE.description: Set true to show deleted messages.

READ_MESSAGE.description: Set true if you want bot to read all messages.
